name: Bholenath
description: Bholenath: The word ‘Bhola’ (Hindi) means – Innocent, simple, down to earth. Lord Shiva is called ‘ Bholenath’ because he is easily pleased and showers his blessings on his devotees without any complex rituals, he gives shelter to any devotee with sincere devotion and a clean heart. Shiva has been worshiped since time immemorial, he is Mahakaal, ruler of time, lord of the universe.
